content: install and configure DirMaint:  Dirmaint code On the 7VMDIR20 user ID that refers to DirMaint 7.2: – MDisks 491/492: Production/test code – MDisks 11f/41f: Production/test interface code, all CONFIG file are here.  Directory files On the DIRMAINT user ID: – 1df MDisk: Primary source directory files, and other CONTROL files, such as EXTENT, AUTHFOR, and so on. – 1db MDisk: Primary location of USER Backup file.  Directory utilities  On the PMAINT user ID: 551 MDisk (DIRECTXA, DIRMAP, and DISKMAP utilities). 10.1.4 Enabling DirMaint You must enable DirMaint on the first member of the SSI cluster only. Other SSI members have DirMaint satellite servers that send user directory update requests to the member where DirMaint is running. DirMaint is included in a disabled state with z/VM. To enable it, complete the following steps: 1. Log on as MAINT720 on member 1 of the z/VM SSI cluster. 2. Verify that the MAINT 51D minidisk is accessed as file mode D and is read/write (R/W): QUERY
